reviews.review: pew pew headcrabs

20多年后，我终于完整的体验了一遍鼎鼎大名的Half-life，之前玩过粉丝的重制版——黑山实验室，感谢Valve的低价，也感谢Valve的source版，原版的画面实在是接受不了。即使仅仅是换了个皮，没做其他改动，我们仍然能体验出Half-life是有多么优秀。场景地图设计在合理性和娱乐性上取得了平衡，敌人设计也很优秀，不过千万别忽视剧情的优秀。中文播主达奇上校做了Half-life系列的全剧情解析，对剧情感兴趣的朋友一定要去看看。

This game is great. Valve knew EXACTLY what they were doing when they made this game! Just don't get it if you're expecting the whole story line to have an actual ending.... Don't get me wrong, this game Does have an ending! It's the game that comes after Half Life 2: Episode TWo that doesn't exist; AKA the Actual ending.
Phenomenal. Even 21 years later
Pra quem gosta de FPS, puzzles e uma boa história, mas você tem ter em mente que o jogo é antigo, mesmo assim é altamente recomendado, principalmente para jogar os outros jogos da série

3 из 10 оружия как будто отполерованы дал мистер проперу и он дал тебе лом, когда увидел чуть не откинулся я провалился в стул, почему охранник не умер когда его бил мутант, стоит себе и стреляет, какого когда я был на одной локации (не помню название главы) как будто твоя видеокарта бухнуло 2 бутылки водяры и начали быть странные формы цвета (зелёный, оранжевый, красный, чёрный) почему когда был возле вышки 1 упала 2 стояла небе как будто сошёл с ума смотрелось крипово, самая ужасная переноска 1 Half-Life на Source движок, не покупайте купите лучше нормальную 1 часть и играйте но не эту, ужас...

I'll never forget that train intro. My computer was shit and I had to restart it over and over again, expecting a bullshit intro like in the id games. But then I got to play the story and it was the same as the intro. Observation only, no cutscenes, no wall of text. It's first person, figure it out. Amazing.

The game is ok, a bad port but overall it's ok, i managed to beat the game but i had to use noclip in 2 parts because they are literally impassable without noclip.
The game has a few changes to the original half-life that you will notice immediately the moment you start playing that is, you run fasted, and jump higher and your crowbar attacks resets the enemy attack, kind of OP if you ask me.

There are still some bugs in the game, visual and gameplay wise, the Gauss Rifle is basically broken, same as the animation.
The game in my opinion feels smoother than the Golden Source Half-Life, which would make the gameplay better if it wasn't for the AI of the enemies being a downgrade and buggier and the fact that the weapon accuracy and recoil is shit compared to OG Half-Life.

The only reason you would want to play this game is for shit's and giggles, if you come into it expecting nothing, then this game is for you.
Does it deserve all the hate people give it? I don't believe so.

Grand classique du jeu vidéo ! Dans la peau de gordon freeman, scientifique au sein de Black Mesa, une faille a ouvert un passage vers le monde de XEN peuplé de créatures qui voudrons vous faire la peau.
C'est toujours bien de faire une saga par le commencement, je vous conseille, si vous ne connaissez pas, de faire les opus suivants :
- Half life Source (jeu d'origine pimpé du moteur source)
-Optionnel : Black Mesa (refonte de Half life avec des graphismes HD et histoire plus développée).
- Half life Opposing force
- Half life Blue shift
- Half life 2
- Half life 2 Episode 1
- Half life Episode 2

The Source port misses the point a lot of times.
You will see bugs like Barnacle's tongues not extending visually yet still grabbing you. 
Also, Goldsource would randomize textures on walls every time you would load a map and source, well, forgets to do this, so while those differences might not be noticeable for first time players, if you want the most accurate version of half life this is not it.

Well, I decided it was finally time to get on the bandwagon and play the game that started it all: Half-Life. Unfortunately, I picked the wrong version to try out. Little did I know, Half-Life: Source has a bunch of crippling bugs that have not been fixed in years.

Some particularly fun bugs: one advanced enemy can't do damage to yourself or your NPCs, spoiling some story moments and making a few segments very easy. A puzzle involving conveyor belts has such severe graphical glitches that it's practically impossible to navigate. The player's walk/run speed seems extremely high, and a lot of the platforming segments become frustrating just because you quickly slide off of surfaces. Sometimes, the AI directing enemy soldiers will lock up, and they will stand frozen while you dispatch them. And, about two thirds of the way through, you begin to encounter Apache helicopters which are un-killable. I'm basically soft-locked on my run, because I can't get across an open area before the chopper guns me down, and none of my weapons work against it.

So yeah, it turns out that HLS is a buggy port. I've read elsewhere that the original game doesn't have any of these problems, though I haven't tried it myself. The parts that work are great, and the genius of the original level and enemy designs shines through, but this game is truly, badly broken.

Well it is Half-Life isn't it?

Obviously this is just the same as the Original. The different is that you can't bash NPC until they are turn to bits, because it's Source Engine. Valve obviously make a goddamn remastered that doesn't worth $h!t. If you own this, keep it, but if you own the original, enjoy it, because you still can use mods and some other stuff. This version only makes it more shinier, more metallic and that's why BLACK MESA was created, because Valve got bored making games. Though, I wouldn't blame them due to "unexplained reasons".

Look, you can still keep, play and enjoy it like the original, but this is just a simple Remaster. It doesn't included mod support like the original. So, if you want a simple game, get this one, but if you want to use mods, go bought the original. Bought two of them including the expansion, if that's make you feel any better.

8.5/10

I tried to take down a chopper all of my gauss ammo but, it didn't work. Even with rpg you can't aim on it. Because, it is really hard to hit, because of its hit boxes. Not a thanks to bugs, it's something annoying that when a security guard (barney) gets damaged, he won't stop using suffering sounds like ahhh, hmmhhh, uah, ıhh, ahhh! Seriously, I thought bugs in this source game port wouldn't be annoying and wouldn't affect whole gameplay but then I realized that no, too many of them to be in a perfect franchise. I know it wasn't buggy way before, but now it is buggy, too much to take care about.
Maybe the only good thing is graphics, it's cool actually but cannot take me away from typing a negative review to a Half-Life game. Buy the original GoldSource engine game, not this one.

Если ты не можешь решиться  с выбором half-life (source или обычная) то сейчас я тебе расскажу плюсы и минусы
Плюсы: Фонарик, в обычной халфе он сделан так себе (ну а вы что ожидали? Она вышла в 1998 г.) а в source он уже доработан и с ним удобнее играть. Графика стала более красивой и качественной но не спеши с покупкой из за графики, о ней я ещё поговорю в минусах. У оружий добавились отражения и это круто. Тела умерших врагов стали более реалистичнее падать при смерти. 
Минусы:  В полюсах я говорил про оружие, так вот: отдача у автомата ПОЛНОЕ ГА... Она ужасная, с него трудно стрелять, а и пока не забыл о отражении на оружии, они есть ВЕЗДЕ, даже там где негде нечего отражать. На уровнях с горама (я уже не помню что там было) они стали 3D но их мало, на уровне где мы получаем рпг есть вертолёт у которого... Маленький хитбокс? Не я серьёзно, пока попадешь скорее стареть спидранером по half-life. Вернёмся к графике, на одном уровне присутствует графический баг из за чего из ваших глаза будет биться кровь.  Ну и последний минут связан с телами после смерти, они исчезают и из них нельзя сделать мясо и поиграть в футбол (в обычном не source мясо от врагов вроде можно было пинать)
Надеюсь я помог тебе определиться с выбором какую халфу купить. (Хочу обратится к людям которые умеют писать обзоры к играм, напишите чем этот обзор вам понравился а чем нет, может здесь есть какие то ошибки или что-то ещё)
